title: An Act relative to problem gambling

abstracts.abstract: By Representative Scanlon of North Attleborough, a petition (accompanied by bill, House, No. 4037) of Adam J. Scanlon relative to problem gambling.  Economic Development and Emerging Technologies.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on Economic Development and Emerging Technologies
